1.name: Read a book
1.description: Grab your favorite, lay in bed and immerse yourself in the world created in front of you!
price: Depends on the book you read

2.name: Workout
2.description: Pick up that dusty old barbell over there and get working out so you can be ripped and impress all of those around you!
price: The price of a gym membership

3.name: Watch a movie
3.description: Pick a movie to either watch by yourself or with others and fall in love with characters you may never meet in real life!
price: Depends on the movie you watch

4.name: Ping Pong
4.description: Grab a friend, or a foe, and battle on the table-top tennis court by hitting the ball back and forth until one inevitably misses!
price: Get yourself a ping pong table and find out!

5.name: Football
5.description: Grab some friends, or your kid, and watch 22 men run angrily at each other to get this oddly shaped ball into this imaginary space of solitude!
price: Cable is expensive, so just watch your neighbors!(Don't actually)

6.name: Hockey
6.description: Watch as 12 people slide around on ice with metal blades and smack each into walls because the hate each other all to get this tiny rubber puck into a small net.

7.name: Tennis
7.description: You have seen Ping Pong, now get ready for the bigger brother Tennis which uses a bigger ball and a bigger rackets to smack the ball back and forth!
price: Just find some free court and get swinging!

8.name: Baseball
8.description: You ever see something flying at you faster than a car and think, 'I can hit that'? Than baseball is the sport for you!
price: All you need is some cleats, a bat and a helmet... so like $99

9.name: Drinking the blood of your enemies
9.description: You ever just hate someone? Think of them as your enemy? Than just drink their blood, like a good 'ol classic vampire. (Disclaimer: This activity is completely illegal and should not be performed)
